name: Sea Battle: Tactical Game
description:
If you like battleship games, but you want more strategy instead luck, you should try Sea Battle: Tactical Game.

The classic pen and paper doodle game with a twist.
Instead having a single shot in each turn, your shot number depends on your fleet health. After each turn, you will only know the position of the successful hits inside the enemy unit, without knowing the exact position on the board. You need to search for patterns to find all the units of your opponent before he can find yours. And remember, after each lost unit, shooting power will decrease.

[Features]

• Notebook like design, “paper and pencil” style drawings
• Standard game play and blind mode for experienced users
• Single player mode for lonely days
• Multiplayer mode, you can play with friends over WIFI or Bluetooth

[Notes]

For best networking experience please ensure that you have the latest iOS version installed on your device
